text: A story should have a beginning, a middle and an end, but not necessarily in that order.
author: Jean-Luc Godard

text: Movies are like an expensive form of therapy for me.
author: Tim Burton

text: Shoot a few scenes out of focus. I want to win the foreign film award.
author: Billy Wilder

text: A film is a petrified fountain of thought.
author: Jean Cocteau

text: I don't take the movies seriously, and anyone who does is in for a headache.
author: Bette Davis
